Job Description: Software developers required with 2 to 4 years of experiece.Requirements Qualifications: Graduate Degree or equivalent in computer science Expert knowledge of .Net programming (C#,  ASP.Net,  MVC,  Linq,  Entity Framework,  WPF,  WCF etc.) Good knowledge of Javascript,  JQuery,  Ajax,  API development Good knowledge of database management,  query designing (MS Sql Server,  My SQL) Good knowledge of web application designing (HTML,  CSS etc.)
